messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Re: Greetings
messages.msgSnippet: Hello to you to. I do plan on popping frequently but only on certain days, like tomorrow as I am a member of many chatgroups. So today I do one page and
messages.messageBody:
Hello to you to. I do plan on popping frequently but only on certain days, like tomorrow as I am a member of many chatgroups. So today I do one page and tomorrow another page of chat groups.
----- Original Message -----
From: GBattista (hajimenokizu)
To: SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, September 28, 2004 7:22 PM
Subject: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Re: Greetings


--- In SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com, "darkmalik" <jcolburn1@c...>
wrote:
> Hello I have just joined this wonderful group for several reasons
#1
> I am a big fan of Rurouni Kenshin, #2 I am a big fan of Peacemaker
> Kurogane, #3 I am a big fan of Gohatto/Taboo. I also own all
> episodes/DVDs of each series and or movie. I am also interested in
> learning the history behind all the character whether they are in
> anime or not. For example, I am interested in learning more about
> Kawakami Gensai, the person for whom Kenshin Himura of Rurouni
> Kenshin was based upon.


Hey hey! Just wanted to say hi to you! It's a little quiet right now
but trust me it's only for now. Hope you drop by frequently and join
the yahoo SHQ mailing list.

~wounds

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Greetings
messages.msgSnippet: I absolutely *have* to welcome a fellow Alexander & Hephaestion fan.  :-D  Welcome to the group of us lost in Meiji Japan.  If you re interested in the
messages.messageBody:
I absolutely *have* to welcome a fellow Alexander & Hephaestion fan. :-D Welcome to the group of us lost in Meiji Japan. If you're interested in the history, I highly recommend you also join our sister list, SHQ, where discussion of history, anime, films, and just about everything else takes place. You'll also have access to files of information collected and compiled by members. And please, check out the message board and database (links at the bottom of the message), for even more.

phil

P.S. I do remember there being links to some sites about the hitokiri over on the message board.


darkmalik <jcolburn1@...> wrote:
Hello I have just joined this wonderful group for several reasons #1
I am a big fan of Rurouni Kenshin, #2 I am a big fan of Peacemaker
Kurogane, #3 I am a big fan of Gohatto/Taboo. I also own all
episodes/DVDs of each series and or movie. I am also interested in
learning the history behind all the character whether they are in
anime or not. For example, I am interested in learning more about
Kawakami Gensai, the person for whom Kenshin Himura of Rurouni
Kenshin was based upon.

messages.subject: Greetings
messages.msgSnippet: Hello I have just joined this wonderful group for several reasons #1 I am a big fan of Rurouni Kenshin, #2 I am a big fan of Peacemaker Kurogane, #3 I am a big
messages.messageBody:
Hello I have just joined this wonderful group for several reasons #1
I am a big fan of Rurouni Kenshin, #2 I am a big fan of Peacemaker
Kurogane, #3 I am a big fan of Gohatto/Taboo. I also own all
episodes/DVDs of each series and or movie. I am also interested in
learning the history behind all the character whether they are in
anime or not. For example, I am interested in learning more about
Kawakami Gensai, the person for whom Kenshin Himura of Rurouni
Kenshin was based upon.
